https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2S08jsy4FkEWiUMmYTfFinNM22P.jpg Die Bad is an inventive feature made up of four distinct episodes, each with their own style. With their criss-crossing characters and themes, they add up to a fairly comprehensive account of the causes and effects of male aggression, both tribal and individual. Die Bad
